name: pi-hole
description: Pi-hole is a self-hosted network-wide ad blocker and DNS sinkhole. It blocks ads and trackers across devices with a lightweight DNS solution and a web-based dashboard for configuration.
features: Network-wide blocking: Block ads and trackers for all devices on your network without individual configuration.
DNS sinkhole: Intercept DNS requests to known ad and tracking domains before they reach devices.
Web dashboard: Monitor blocking statistics, query logs, and network activity through an intuitive interface.
Blocklist management: Subscribe to curated blocklists or create custom lists for granular control.
Query logging: View detailed logs of all DNS queries with timestamps, clients, and block status.
Whitelist and blacklist: Override blocklists with custom allow and deny rules for specific domains.
DHCP server: Optionally serve DHCP to automatically configure network devices to use Pi-hole.
API access: Integrate with other tools and scripts using the built-in REST API.
Group management: Apply different blocking policies to device groups for customized filtering.
Conditional forwarding: Route specific DNS queries to designated servers for local network resolution.
Privacy protection: Block tracking domains to enhance privacy across all network devices.
Performance metrics: Track DNS query response times and blocking effectiveness with statistics.
